measures.goal: Keep cases to a minimum from outside sources.
measures.measure: All travel outside of the country is discouraged, and residents abroad are asked to return ASAP to Iceland.

measures.goal: To slow the spread of the virus
measures.measure: A 2 metre social distance is to be held. In places where you can not, and you haven't completed isolation, you must wear a facemask.

measures.goal: To stop the virus from spreading
measures.measure: When having simptoms you are required to self isolate. Failing in doing so wil result in a fine.
